name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Access and Malicious Script Execution
description: This playbook details the actions required to respond to an incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts to exfiltrate sensitive data from the network.

parallel--c5b28b00-8ac5-4a2a-9e61-d39425.name: Immediate Response Actions
parallel--c5b28b00-8ac5-4a2a-9e61-d39425.description: Execute critical response actions in parallel for rapid containment.

action--5d99cde4-1812-4e2a-bd64-b892bc50.name: Kill malicious process
action--5d99cde4-1812-4e2a-bd64-b892bc50.description: Terminate any running instances of the malicious scripting process.

action--b4f6720b-86dc-4df8-8c1d-094bb3a3.name: Block outgoing access to malicious IP
action--b4f6720b-86dc-4df8-8c1d-094bb3a3.description: Prevent any further data exfiltration by blocking the malicious IP address.

action--7f77b3c1-5991-4c47-8ec6-d24cb998.name: Notify security team
action--7f77b3c1-5991-4c47-8ec6-d24cb998.description: Send a notification about the security incident to the security team.

commands.command: echo 'Security Alert: Potential breach on server-01' | mail -s 'Incident Notification' security@organization.com

action--d185a7f0-0ea4-4dfb-b062-09d5bc29.name: Run antivirus scan
action--d185a7f0-0ea4-4dfb-b062-09d5bc29.description: Perform a comprehensive antivirus scan on affected systems to detect further threats.

while-condition--75e8e3e1-e99a-4b4c-996d.name: Antivirus Scan Loop
while-condition--75e8e3e1-e99a-4b4c-996d.description: Repeat the antivirus scan until no threats are detected.

action--aa09ab28-5857-4cae-b3a0-26b0a29e.name: Change passwords for affected accounts
action--aa09ab28-5857-4cae-b3a0-26b0a29e.description: Reset passwords for accounts that showed suspicious activity.

suspicious_activity_detected.description: Indicates if suspicious activity was detected in the logs.
